statements: SELECT * FROM client_preferences;
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name FROM client_preferences;
SELECT last_name, first_name, email FROM client_preferences;
SELECT * FROM client_preferences ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, email, preference_1 FROM client_preferences WHERE preference_1='Value';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM client_preferences WHERE client_id = 1
SELECT * FROM client_preferences WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT last_name, first_name, email, preference_1 FROM client_preferences ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name, email, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM client_preferences WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY client_id DESC
SELECT client_id, email FROM client_preferences WHERE preference_1 IS NOT NULL AND preference_2 IS NOT NULL AND preference_3 IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM clients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description, created_at FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM clients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT clients.*, trading_strategies.strategy_name, trading_strategies.strategy_description FROM clients INNER JOIN trading_strategies ON clients.client_id = trading_strategies.client_id;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies LEFT JOIN clients ON trading_strategies.client_id = clients.client_id ORDER BY trading_strategies.created_at DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences
SELECT client_name, client_balance FROM clients ORDER BY client_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_type='Long'
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_name LIKE '%theme%'
SELECT client_name, client_balance FROM clients ORDER BY client_balance DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT client_name, client_email, strategy_type FROM clients JOIN trading_strategies ON clients.client_id = trading_strategies.client_id ORDER BY client_name ASC
SELECT client_name, COUNT(strategy_id) AS total_strategies FROM clients LEFT JOIN trading_strategies ON clients.client_id = trading_strategies.client_id GROUP BY client_name
SELECT client_name, preference_name, preference_value FROM clients JOIN preferences ON clients.client_id = preferences.client_id WHERE preference_name LIKE '%risk%'
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM clients;
SELECT id, name, email FROM clients ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, strategy_name, preference_data FROM client_trading_prefs ORDER BY client_id, strategy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT c.name, p.preference_data FROM clients c JOIN client_trading_prefs p ON c.id = p.client_id WHERE p.strategy_id = 2;
SELECT c.name, t.description FROM clients c JOIN client_trading_prefs p ON c.id = p.client_id JOIN trading_strategies t ON p.strategy_id = t.id;
SELECT id, name, phone FROM clients WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY phone DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, phone_number FROM clients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000.00;
SELECT client_name, strategy_name FROM clients JOIN strategies ON clients.client_id = strategies.client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT accounts.account_id, clients.client_name, accounts.balance FROM accounts INNER JOIN clients ON accounts.client_id = clients.client_id;

SELECT preferences.investment_type, preferences.risk_tolerance, clients.client_name FROM preferences JOIN clients ON preferences.client_id = clients.client_id WHERE preferences.risk_tolerance = 'high';

SELECT transactions.amount, transactions.timestamp, clients.client_name FROM transactions INNER JOIN clients ON transactions.client_id = clients.client_id ORDER BY transactions.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
